critique: This document is a specific exception to civil service rules for a particular person. It is difficult to generalize about its political implications. It seems motivated by compassion for the widow of a long-time government employee who died in service. There's no clear ideological tilt, immigration aspect, impact on executive power, federalism implications, or national security concerns. It has a very slight impact on economic regulation (as it circumvents civil service rules) and social inclusion (by providing an opportunity to someone in need).
